name: ALOpsExtensionAPI
description: Get/Publish extensions with the Business Central API
author: Hodor
helpMarkDown: Get/Publish extensions with the Business Central API.

inputs.name: usedocker
inputs.label: In Docker
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run task in Docker container. $(usedocker) $(usedocker) $(usedocker)

inputs.name: fixed_tag
inputs.label: Fixed Container Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allows recycling of docker containers. $(fixed_tag) $(fixed_tag) $(fixed_tag)

inputs.name: interaction
inputs.label: API Interaction
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set Interaction Method to use. (Get/Publish/Batch Publish). $(interaction) $(interaction) $(interaction)

inputs.name: api_endpoint
inputs.label: API Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set API Endpoint. (protocol://host:port/serverinstance/api) $(api_endpoint) $(api_endpoint) $(api_endpoint)

inputs.name: dev_endpoint
inputs.label: DEV Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set DEV Endpoint. (protocol://host:port/serverinstance/dev) $(dev_endpoint) $(dev_endpoint) $(dev_endpoint)

inputs.name: dev_schemeupdatemode
inputs.label: DEV Schema Update Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set Schema Update Mode to use with DEVPort deploy. (synchronize/recreate/forcesync) $(dev_schemeupdatemode) $(dev_schemeupdatemode) $(dev_schemeupdatemode)

inputs.name: apiversion
inputs.label: API Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the API to use (beta / v1.0 / v2.0) $(apiversion) $(apiversion) $(apiversion)

inputs.name: authentication
inputs.label: API Authentication
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set authentication Method to use. Default [Windows]. $(authentication) $(authentication) $(authentication)

inputs.name: azure_tenant_id
inputs.label: Tenant Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Tenant Id. Only required for BC SaaS $(azure_tenant_id) $(azure_tenant_id) $(azure_tenant_id)

inputs.name: azure_app_client_id
inputs.label: Client Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure AD Application Client Id. $(azure_app_client_id) $(azure_app_client_id) $(azure_app_client_id)

inputs.name: azure_app_client_secret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure AD Application Client Secret. $(azure_app_client_secret) $(azure_app_client_secret) $(azure_app_client_secret)

inputs.name: azure_app_client_certificate
inputs.label: Client Certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure AD Application Client Certificate. $(azure_app_client_certificate) $(azure_app_client_certificate) $(azure_app_client_certificate)

inputs.name: azure_app_client_certificate_password
inputs.label: Client Certificate Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure AD Application Client Certificate Password. $(azure_app_client_certificate_password) $(azure_app_client_certificate_password) $(azure_app_client_certificate_password)

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Business Central Username. Leave empty for Service-2-Service authentication. $(username) $(username) $(username)

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Business Central User Password. Leave empty for Service-2-Service authentication. $(password) $(password) $(password)

inputs.name: bccompany
inputs.label: BC Company (Id or Name)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Business Central Company (Id or Name). $(bccompany) $(bccompany) $(bccompany)

inputs.name: artifact_path
inputs.label: Path to publish
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path for App Artifact. $(artifact_path) $(artifact_path) $(artifact_path)

inputs.name: artifact_filter
inputs.label: App filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filter used for locating App file relative to $(path_to_publish). $(artifact_filter) $(artifact_filter) $(artifact_filter)

inputs.name: showdeploymentstatus
inputs.label: Show Deployment Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Show Extension Deployment Status. $(showdeploymentstatus) $(showdeploymentstatus) $(showdeploymentstatus)

inputs.name: checksecondsdelay
inputs.label: Check Delay (Sec)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Seconds of delay betweel deployment status checks. $(checksecondsdelay) $(checksecondsdelay) $(checksecondsdelay)

inputs.name: maxtries
inputs.label: Max tries for status check
inputs.helpMarkDown: Max tries for status check. $(maxtries) $(maxtries) $(maxtries)

inputs.name: replacepackageid
inputs.label: Replace PackageID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Force a new PackageID for each deployment. $(replacepackageid) $(replacepackageid) $(replacepackageid)

inputs.name: blocksymbolsonly
inputs.label: Block Symbols Only
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check App, block if SymbolsOnly App. $(blocksymbolsonly) $(blocksymbolsonly) $(blocksymbolsonly)
